name: eatodo
description: Simple TODO application built with Electron and AngularJS.

scripts.release:osx: copyfiles -f dist/mac/*.{dmg,zip} release/osx && PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat app/package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && echo $PACKAGE_VERSION >> ./release/osx/VERSION
scripts.deploy: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat app/package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && aws s3 sync release/ s3://eatodo/updates/$PACKAGE_VERSION/ --acl public-read && aws s3 sync s3://eatodo/updates/$PACKAGE_VERSION/ s3://eatodo/updates/latest/ --delete --acl public-read

author: Vjekoslav Ratkajec
